flavors.description: Dark Chocolate Fresh Frozen Custard swirled with a ribbon of peanut butter and crunchy Butterfinger pieces.
Creamy Cheesecake Fresh Frozen Custard swirled with ribbons of old fashioned salted caramel, chopped Dove® Chocolate pieces, toasted pecan pieces and rich cheesecake pieces.
A Culver's Classic! We begin with creamy Vanilla Fresh Frozen Custard and swirl in ribbons of old fashioned salted caramel, novelty chocolate, and toasted pecan pieces.
Double up on deliciousness with Caramel Fresh Frozen Custard swirled with toasted pecan pieces and novelty chocolate.
A Culver's Classic! We begin with creamy Vanilla Fresh Frozen Custard and swirl in ribbons of old fashioned salted caramel, novelty chocolate, and toasted pecan pieces.
Culver’s Classic! Our creamy Vanilla Fresh Frozen Custard swirled with ribbons of old fashioned salted caramel and loaded with lightly salted cashew pieces.
Chocolate custard with a rum caramel swirl, chocolate covered peanuts, chocolate chips and roasted almonds
Strawberry custard + white chocolate custard + pomegranate ribbon + white chocolate curls
Toffee frozen custard, English toffee bits, roasted pecan pieces
Caramel custard with roasted cashew halves.
